subject: Baseball
Labor and Jobs
Part-Time Employment
lead_paragraph: The Mets’ Collin McHugh has a winter job with an Atlanta fund-raising company, but what used to be common, like Stan Musial selling Christmas trees, is now a rarity.
snippet: The Mets’ Collin McHugh has a winter job with an Atlanta fund-raising company, but what used to be common, like Stan Musial selling Christmas trees, is now a rarity.
